DOC.brief_summary: In computerized experiment , visual stimulus present parkinson 's disease patient control . They respond image act keyboard specific manner . Each participant repeat task 384 time per session . A break insert every 12 test participant rest . The experiment consist three session . Each image present three time . For first two presentation assume link create image task , image action . In third presentation , task action maintain swapped . In way , It check whether association thus generate affect performance participant tasks action incongruent .
